nodes.text: P6-K4 was an astromech droid that served the Galactic Republic aboard Carrick Station during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire.

P6-K4 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel as the Republic Flashpoint courier for the flashpoint "Korriban Incursion", though he is only found aboard Carrick Station and not on other planets like other couriers.
